items.content_html: A lightweight, effective session management library for Next.js that requires little setup to handle sessions.
items.title: nisabmohd/ease-session: A lightweight, effective session management library for Next.js that requires little setup to handle sessions.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool to encrypt and decrypt environment variable.
items.title: andreasdelu/envcryptor: A lightweight tool to encrypt and decrypt environment variable.

items.content_html: Splidebox is a lightweight JavaScript library for creating customisable image lightboxes using Splide.js. Easily integrate image galleries into your web applications with minimal setup. Supports responsive design and provides options for customizing open/close buttons, image sources, and more.
items.title: LeashFox/splidebox: Splidebox is a lightweight JavaScript library for creating customisable image lightboxes using Splide.js. Easily integrate image galleries into your web applications with minimal setup. Supports responsive design and provides options for customizing open/close buttons, image sources, and more.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.
items.title: Haileamlak1/react-todo-app: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.
